meanings.definition: A box-shaped container that slides in and out of a piece of furniture, used for storing items.
meanings.sent1: I opened the drawer to find my favorite socks.
meanings.sent2: She placed the keys in the drawer to keep them safe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat jumped into the drawer and got stuck.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a drawer overflowing with memories.
meanings.sent5: The drawer creaked as it was pulled open, revealing a hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: A person who draws, especially an artist or designer.
meanings.sent1: The talented drawer sketched a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent2: The famous drawer created stunning illustrations for the book.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy drawer accidentally spilled ink all over the paper.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination turned her into a drawer of endless creativity.
meanings.sent5: The skilled drawer brought characters to life with each stroke of the pencil.
